name: Blissey
author: Mizue
flavor_text: This Pokémon is overflowing with love. Only Chansey that share a strong bond with their Trainer can evolve, so people say.

abilities.name: Expert in Roundness
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to each of your Pokémon that has the Let’s All Rollout attack by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon VMAX.

attacks.name: Let’s All Rollout
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has the Let’s All Rollout attack.
